project_descr: SUPPORT TO JUVENILE JUSTICE IN SYRIA

outputs.output_descr: This project provides support to enhancing juvenile justice in Syria through the leveraging of specialized capacity development programmes and sensitization programmes for select pilot Juvenile Reform Institutions in Syria.  The project will also work on the policy level through the creation of a Juvenile Information System to facilitate the processing and necessary follow up on juvenile cases as well as familiarize key stakeholders with international standards and models of juvenile justice in order to support a national strategy for legislative reform in the application of juvenile justice.

project_title: support to juvenile justice in syria
